strings.forum: A great place to have longer and more in depth discussions, especially great for showcasing your work in a place where you can gain feedback steadily over time, allow members to subscribe to your thread for news updates and participate in longer term events.
strings.discord: A great place for immediate interaction in a faster paced environment, especially great if you need to get immediate thoughts on your works here. You may also organize multiplayer sessions and participate in voice chat.
